description: A Detailed Overview of one Well

panels.description: Shows the Location of the selected Well

targets.rawSql: SELECT m_timestamp AS "time", cast(m_value as double precision) / ( well.w_diameter * well.w_maxdepth ) as level_percentage, w_lat, w_long, ('Water Level of Well ' || w_name || '') as tooltip FROM measurement JOIN well on m_fk_wellid = w_id JOIN sensor_type on measurement.sensor_type_st_id = sensor_type.st_id WHERE w_id = '[[w_id]]' and sensor_type.st_value = 'level' ORDER BY time desc LIMIT 1

panels.title: Well Location

panels.description: The fill of the well in percent

items.description: Arrow facing up down left right
items.name: arrow-up-down-left-right

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m_timestamp AS "time",
  w_lat,
  w_long,
  w_name,
  (cast(m_value as double precision)/(w_maxdepth)) as percentage
FROM measurement
JOIN well w on m_fk_wellid = w_id
JOIN sensor_type on measurement.sensor_type_st_id = sensor_type.st_id
WHERE w_id = '[[w_id]]' and $__timeFilter(m_timestamp) and sensor_type.st_value = 'level'
ORDER BY time desc LIMIT 1

panels.title: Current water level in percent

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  w_name
FROM
  well
WHERE
  w_id = '[[w_id]]'

SELECT
  m_timestamp AS "time",
  w_name,
  cast(m_value as double precision)
FROM measurement
JOIN well w on m_fk_wellid = w_id
JOIN sensor_type on measurement.sensor_type_st_id = sensor_type.st_id
WHERE w_id = '[[w_id]]' and $__timeFilter(m_timestamp) and sensor_type.st_value = 'ph'
ORDER BY time desc LIMIT 1

SELECT
  m_timestamp AS "time",
  w_name,
  cast(m_value as double precision)
FROM measurement
JOIN well w on m_fk_wellid = w_id
JOIN sensor_type on measurement.sensor_type_st_id = sensor_type.st_id
WHERE w_id = '[[w_id]]' and $__timeFilter(m_timestamp) and sensor_type.st_value = 'temp'
ORDER BY time desc LIMIT 1

panels.description: Shows the development of the water level in the selected timeframe

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m_timestamp AS "time",
  cast(m_value as double precision) as water_level_value,
  w_name
FROM measurement
JOIN well on m_fk_wellid = w_id
JOIN sensor_type on measurement.sensor_type_st_id = sensor_type.st_id
WHERE w_id = '[[w_id]]' and sensor_type.st_value = 'level' and $__timeFilter(m_timestamp)
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Water level over time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m_timestamp AS "time",
  cast(m_value as double precision) as ph_value,
  w_name
FROM measurement
JOIN well on m_fk_wellid = w_id
JOIN sensor_type on measurement.sensor_type_st_id = sensor_type.st_id
WHERE w_id = '[[w_id]]' and sensor_type.st_value = 'ph' and  $__timeFilter(m_timestamp)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  m_timestamp AS "time",
  cast(m_value as double precision) as tmp_value,
  w_name
FROM measurement
JOIN well on m_fk_wellid = w_id
JOIN sensor_type on measurement.sensor_type_st_id = sensor_type.st_id
WHERE w_id = '[[w_id]]' and sensor_type.st_value = 'temp' and $__timeFilter(m_timestamp)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  m_timestamp AS "time",
  cast(m_value as decimal),
  w_name
FROM measurement
JOIN well on m_fk_wellid = w_id
JOIN sensor_type on measurement.sensor_type_st_id = sensor_type.st_id
WHERE w_id = '[[w_id]]' and sensor_type.st_value = 'ph' and $__timeFilter(m_timestamp)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  m_timestamp AS "time",
  cast(m_value as decimal),
  w_name
FROM measurement
JOIN well on m_fk_wellid = w_id
JOIN sensor_type on measurement.sensor_type_st_id = sensor_type.st_id
WHERE w_id = '[[w_id]]' and sensor_type.st_value = 'temp' and $__timeFilter(m_timestamp)
ORDER BY time

title: Well Inspection
